channel.title: Techno Babble (Alessandro Minali)
channel.description: Technical blog exploring topics of programming, code architecture and project design.

item.title: Tweet for Twitch
item.description: Twitter bot to shout when you are live streaming

item.title: Swing Sinatra onto a VPS: A Definitive Tutorial
item.description: Definitive tutorial to getting your Sinatra app onto a linux server

item.title: Sinatra + Reverse Proxy(Lighttpd) + SSL
item.description: A quick guide to getting a secure HTTPS sinatra app for free.

item.title: Raising a Dead Project Back to Life (Sinatra/PhantomJs)
item.description: A guide on how programmers deal with old code and projects. Debug stale work and make it run again.

item.title: Making an App Asynchronous and More (Sinatra/PhantomJs)
item.description: A guide about using non-blocking async javascript, cleaning up code, and improving speed of an old personal project.

item.title: Building Rack Middleware to Block Malicious Users
item.description: A guide on how to use custom rack middleware as a protective layer for your apps.

item.title: Simply Tracking Your Expenses (UNIX/Bash)
item.description: A tutorial on creating a simple and minimally useful script to track expenses via command line.

item.title: Reading Time for Technical Blogs (Javascript)
item.description: A guide on how to calculate a best estimate of how long a blog entry that covers code will take to read.

item.title: Monkey Patching in Ruby - Real World Example
item.description: A guide walking readers through a real world use case of monkey patching in ruby, dealing with other gems and ORMs.

item.title: Lower Page Sizes by Defering Junk (Javascript)
item.description: A guide on not loading a bunch of garbage javascript, goddammit!

item.title: Trouble Shooting Your New Gem (Ruby/Git)
item.description: A helpful post about troubleshooting why a fresh local gem seemingly doesn't work.

item.title: Fighting Back Against Ad-Block Blockers
item.description: A helpful post on how to block ad blockers.

item.title: Updating Let's Encrypt for Lighttpd
item.description: Blog leading you through updating certbot on a lighttpd server.
